about_the_game:
The complete soundtrack for the indie multiplayer game, Miner Meltdown!

Featuring 7 songs from the game, and 3 bonus demo tracks - all composed & produced by Bob Baffy.
The Miner Meltdown Official Soundtrack is tremendously catchy and is the perfect background music for your mining lifestyle.

Track List - (All In MP3 Format)

1. Title Music 01:52
2. Jungle Theme 02:40
3. Ice Theme 02:52
4. Subterranean Theme 02:10
5. Generic Theme 02:56
6. Time to Panic! 01:32
7. Results Screen 00:54
8. Chop Chop (Demo) 02:02
9. Heartbeat (Demo) 02:10
10. Underground (Demo) 01:00
